sources.title: Amore Piombo E Furore
sources.description: Gunslinger Clayton Drumm is about to be hanged when he is given a chance to live if he will agree to murder Matthew (Oates), a miner who has steadfastly refused to sell his land to the railroad company. Matthew’s refusal is a major obstacle to the railroad’s plans for expansion. Watch on RetroFlix:  https://retroflix.org/amore-piombo-e-furore-1978/
